briefTitle: Virtual Reality-based Exercise Training in Radiotherapy Period After Breast Cancer Surgery
officialTitle: Comparison of Exercise Practices With Virtual Reality-based Exercise Training in Radiotherapy Period After Breast Cancer Surgery
conditions: Breast Cancer, Exercise, Upper Extremity Dysfunction
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in the shoulder range of motion
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Being over 18 years old
* Being literate
* Having a diagnosis of unilateral breast cancer
* Having undergone surgery for breast cancer
* Radiotherapy will be applied for breast cancer treatment.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastasis
* Have an active infection
* Having a cardiac or neurological disease that would prevent participation in the study
* Having uncontrolled hypertension
* Having an orthopedic disorder that prevents exercise
* Having sensory or cognitive impairments that interfere with communication
